allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add Mistral OCR, fix RLS issues, add team/patient management APIs

- Replace PDF processing with Mistral OCR for better scanned document support
- Add service role client to bypass RLS recursion issues
- Create API routes for study members (POST/DELETE)
- Create API route for patients (POST)
- Update study detail page to fetch via API
- Fix dashboard query to avoid study_members RLS issues
- Update README and env example for new dependencies

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add user access control and admin system

- Lock down registration (invitation-only, no self-signup with role selection)
- Add admin panel with user management (/admin/users)
- Add invitation system for new users (/admin/invitations)
- Add invitation acceptance flow (/invite/[token])
- Update dashboard to show owned + assigned studies
- Allow PIs to invite new users directly from study page
- Add role-based access (admin can manage all, PI can create studies, coordinator can view assigned)
- Add invitations table schema to SETUP.md

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
